mapper.insert: insert into db_scanorder (ORDERID, EXPRESSTYPEID, EXPRESSID, ORDERWEIGHT, OPER, OPERTIME, FLAG, MAILFLAG, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, GROUPID, EXPRESSTYPE, RESERVE1) values (#{orderid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{expresstypeid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{expressid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderweight,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mailflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{groupid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{expresstype,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{reserve1,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update db_scanorder set EXPRESSTYPEID = #{expresstypeid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXPRESSID = #{expressid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDERWEIGHT = #{orderweight,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, OPER = #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERTIME = #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FLAG = #{flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MAILFLAG = #{mailflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE2 = #{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE3 = #{reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GROUPID = #{groupid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXPRESSTYPE = #{expresstype,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, RESERVE1 = #{reserve1,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where ORDERID = #{orderid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ORDERID, EXPRESSTYPEID, EXPRESSID, ORDERWEIGHT, OPER, OPERTIME, FLAG, MAILFLAG, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, GROUPID, EXPRESSTYPE, RESERVE1 from db_scanorder where ORDERID = #{orderid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select ORDERID, EXPRESSTYPEID, EXPRESSID, ORDERWEIGHT, OPER, OPERTIME, FLAG, MAILFLAG, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, GROUPID, EXPRESSTYPE, RESERVE1 from db_scanorder
